title: Splitbus Nation Photographs 2012 - The GB Report

posts.content:
Hi guys! I have finally got around to uploading all my photographs from splitbus nation to flickr. Il put a good few on here and will direct you to my facebook or flickr for you to browse at your pleasure.

On facebook, feel free to tag yourself /friends/family and share

Flickr http://www.flickr.com/photos/30567413@N ... 260204738/

Facebook http://www.facebook.com/pages/South-Coa ... 6060043435


Splitbus Nation 2012 by Aircooledbenny - SC Automotive Photography, on Flickr

Leaving on thursday Morning

Arival at the campsite,


Splitbus Nation 2012 by Aircooledbenny - SC Automotive Photography, on Flickr


Splitbus Nation 2012 by Aircooledbenny - SC Automotive Photography, on Flickr



On the thursday we set up camp, and on friday we had a free day so we went for a bit of a walk around the local town. Took a few pictures it was really cool. Found a few shops to get our needs, such as milk, bread and beer.

It had some cool looking places.

We took a cruise, we were at the front so didn't get many pictures of that, untill we cruised home

We went over to an industrial estate where a few restoration companys were. Doing Scooters / VWs / Porsche's etc. Got some free drinks and some munch! Plenty of cool stuff, I got distracted by the awesome beetles

Hope you like the photos I had a fantastic weekend away. I would recomend this to any split enthusaist who wants an awesome weekend away that is really relaxed and chilled. Perfect organisation all weekend and its definately a family friendly event. There were stuff for kids everywhere, the site you stay on had so much to do, and when you camp there you get free tickets to the swimming pool, so even better

Thanks!
awesome pics and thnx for the kind words . We do our best to make everyone leaving back home with a good feeling
Wow! Awesome pictures

you captured the event beautifully
love the refelction in the puddle pics especially!
Cheers dude! Il drop you an email soon!
Great pics Benny as usual.cheers for posting them
Thanks for the great pics. This show will be one for me next time. Looks fantastic.

author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
Fantastic pics. As they say, a picture paints a thousand words and that was a brilliant write up. I see there was your bugs older brother on the industrial estate some serious camber going on there as well
Thanks for sharing the photos with us dude

Shalom, Lee

Great photos as always Benny You got a little report for the mag lined up?

Going to make the effort next year for Splits By The Lake
Yep will do dude
amazing pics mate well done, we will be sure to get on this weekend next year hopefully

funky_rick wrote:amazing pics mate well done, we will be sure to get on this weekend next year hopefully


won't be able to until 2014 mate, it only runs every 2 years

R32tom wrote:
funky_rick wrote:amazing pics mate well done, we will be sure to get on this weekend next year hopefully


won't be able to until 2014 mate, it only runs every 2 years


Yea funky_rick but dont let that put you off,as on evry alternative year its Splits at the lake,which is just as good ,but in Holland
